description:
Unit test for testing configdrive has bad network_info.

Normally network_info should have a list with dicts (informations about instance network interfaces).


In test_create_configdrive network_info is mocked and its not a list.
title: Config drive test has bad network_info

comments.content:
Unit test for testing configdrive has bad network_info.

Normally network_info should have a list with dicts (informations about instance network interfaces).


In test_create_configdrive network_info is mocked and its not a list.
